sections.title: Senior Clojure Developer
sections.subtitle: Kleene · August 2022 - now
content: Designed and implemented end-to-end features across multiple layers, ensuring seamless functionality.
Collaborated with product teams to consult on feature proposals, resulting in more efficient and feasible implementation.
Initiated the development of new features and improvements, driving innovation and progress within the company.

sections.title: CTO / Co-Founder
sections.subtitle: RWS Sp. z o.o. · VII 2021 - III 2022

sections.title: Lead Software Developer
sections.subtitle: Retailic Sp. z o.o. · 2020 - July 2022
content: Managed a team of frontend developers and successfully delivered multiple eCommerce projects using React and React Native
Strategized project plans and pricing to ensure smooth delivery within allocated budgets
Performed high-level responsibilities as a senior member, contributing significantly towards the success of each project.

sections.title: Senior Software Developer
sections.subtitle: Retailic Sp. z o.o. · 2018 - 2020
content: Led the development of React and React Native projects, delivering high-quality code that resulted in improved user experiences.
Provided guidance to junior developers through mentoring sessions and conducting thorough code reviews, leading to an increase in team productivity and skills advancement.
Developed internal tools that streamlined project workflows and increased efficiency across departments.

sections.title: Frontend Developer
sections.subtitle: Retailic Sp. z o.o. · VII 2016 - 2018
content: Development and support in creating e-commerce applications based on ReactJS and AngularJS frameworks;
Implementation of other business applications based on the Clojure, JavaScript and Python programming languages;
Consultation of business requirements with project managers;

sections.title: Web developer
sections.subtitle: Social Karma Sp. z o.o. · X 2015 - VII 2016
content: Creating websites, managing existing projects, most often using CMS Wordpress, speeding up operations, optimization for search engines;
Creating graphic designs for websites and presentations.

sections.title: IT Project Management
sections.content: Team management, selecting technologies and tools, conducting valuations, managing a technological strategy
